1.0.name: wordpress/wepay-wordpress-plugin
1.0.description:
You can easily create wepay buttons with simple short codes.

What you can do with this version - See you account balance - Create buttons for your users to make payments on using shortcodes. (Totally customizable, make the button any type.) - Settings Menu to control API information
